title: textfiles.com
summary: I am a lover of ASCII art and text files in general. I love vim and writing in markdown and plaintext. You can bet I was excited when I stumbled across textfiles.com.
author: Gabe Koss

title: SSH Port Forwarding with Ruby Net::SSH
summary: A simple way that Ruby can be used to manage a reverse SSH tunnel for port forwarding.

summary: tl;dr Legal does an awesome job making the various open source licenses accessible and understandable.

summary: Just a little bit of quirkyness around Ruby String interpolation I've noticed.

title: Riak 101
